casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

February, 1954.

(February 3, 1954.) Frank H. Reese, Appellant, v. Fred L. Newton, Respondent.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment for defendant for no cause of action in an automobile negligence action. The order denies a motion for a new trial.) Present — McCurn, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball, Piper and Wheeler, JJ.
